detectors.description: AirDrop.destroy() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#86-91) ignores return value by token.transfer(owner,balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#89)

Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#16-19) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#18)

AirDrop.sendInternally(address,uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#70-79) has external calls inside a loop: token.transfer(recipient,tokensToSend) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ff/ff7a73983fa6b6b2adcc3981fdcdf36970f07175_AirDrop.sol#74)
